handlers.code:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------ Ship Info by Krengus ------
version = 0.23 -- support and feedback: https://discord.gg/BfnbtFyHrt

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- USER VARIABLES --

Hub1_Max_Volume = 12000 --export
Hub2_Max_Volume = 487500 --export
Hub3_Max_Volume = 12000 --export
Hub4_Max_Volume = 12000 --export

Container_Optimization = 5 --export
Fuel_Tank_Optimization = 5 --export
Space_Fuel_Tank_Handling = 5 --export
Atmo_Fuel_Tank_Handling = 5 --export
Rocket_Fuel_Tank_Handling = 5 --export

theme = 3 --export: select theme number (1,2)

--color1 = {r=0.06,g=0.76,b=1} 
--color2 = {r=1,g=204/255,b=153/255}

--background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/61625/2b9422dc-dd18-4b00-b16b-d3cb3f2eff33.jpg"
--background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/61625/d3fb78ed-90bd-4b2e-945a-7bbed92932e2.png" 

Refresh_Rate = 1 --export
Show_Unit = true --export
Debug = false --export





if theme == 1 then
    color1 = {r=1,g=200/255,b=27/255} 
    color2 = {r=1,g=1,b=1}
    background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/61625/bcacc064-8bd6-42d5-a9fd-8c91be03f114.jpg"
elseif theme == 2 then
    color1 = {r=1,g=1,b=1} 
    color2 = {r=1,g=1,b=1}
    background = ""
elseif theme == 3 then
    color1 = {r=18/255,g=134/255,b=168/255}
    color2 = {r=50/255,g=116/255,b=52/255} 
    background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/61625/d3fb78ed-90bd-4b2e-945a-7bbed92932e2.png"
else
    color1 = {r=0.06,g=0.76,b=1} 
    color2 = {r=1,g=204/255,b=153/255} 
    background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/61625/916a89d6-4103-4b28-9a48-04575d9a2b2b.png" --export
end



------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- SCRIPT START --


unit.setTimer("upd",Refresh_Rate)
if Show_Unit == false then unit.hide() end

MaxHandlingHP = 1.2 -- multiplier for maxed HP handling talents
-- base hitpoints, used to find out tank size and weight        
AtmoTankXS = 49
AtmoTankS = 162
AtmoTankM = 1314
AtmoTankL = 10460
SpaceTankXS = 49
SpaceTankS = 186
SpaceTankM = 1495
SpaceTankL = 15932
RocketTankXS = 365
RocketTankS = 735
RocketTankM = 6230
RocketTankL = 68823

ArrowShown = false
FirstRun = true
OldContent = {}



local screens =  {}
local hubs = {}

for slot,element in pairs(unit)do 
    if type(element)=="table"and type(element.export)=="table"then
        if element.getElementClass then
            if element.getElementClass()=="ScreenUnit"then 
                screens[#screens+1]=element
            elseif element.getElementClass()=="CoreUnitDynamic"then 
                core=element
            elseif element.getElementClass()=="ItemContainer"then
                hubs[#hubs+1]=element
                hubs[#hubs].slot=slot
            end 
        end 
    end 
end

if not next(screens) then
    system.print("No screen found")
    unit.exit()
end

if core == nil then
    system.print("No core found")
    unit.exit()
end

if not next(hubs) then
    system.print("No hub found")
    unit.exit()
end



-- Initial hub table


local HubMaxVol = {Hub1_Max_Volume,Hub2_Max_Volume,Hub3_Max_Volume,Hub4_Max_Volume}


table.sort(hubs, function(a,b) return a.slot < b.slot end) -- sorting hubs table by slot

local Hubs = {}
for i=1, #hubs do
    Hubs[i] = {
        l = core.getElementNameById(hubs[i].getId()),
        m = HubMaxVol[i],
        v = math.floor(hubs[i].getItemsVolume()),
        w = math.floor(hubs[i].getItemsMass()/1000)
    }
end




function FormatTable(arr)
    table.sort(arr, function(a,b) return a.w > b.w end) -- sorting table, heaviest first
    local a = {}
    for i = 1, 3 do 
        if i < #arr+1 then -- limiting table to 3 lines
            table.insert(a,{l = arr[i].l,w = math.floor(arr[i].w)})
        end
    end
    return a
end

-- Initial tank table

local tanks = {}
local TotalMaxHitPoints = 0
local TotalHitPoints = 0
local BrokenCount = 0
local DamagedCount = 0

local elements = core.getElementIdList()
  --  local DamagedElements = '' -- initializing data as string



for i = 1, #elements do -- building tanks and HP initial table

    local MaxHitPoints = core.getElementMaxHitPointsById(elements[i])
    local ElementType = core.getElementTypeById(elements[i]) 
    local HitPoints = core.getElementHitPointsById(elements[i])
    
    if tonumber(HitPoints) < tonumber(MaxHitPoints) then
        if HitPoints == 0 then BrokenCount = BrokenCount +1 end
        if HitPoints > 0 then DamagedCount = DamagedCount +1 end
    end

    TotalMaxHitPoints = TotalMaxHitPoints + MaxHitPoints
    TotalHitPoints = TotalHitPoints + HitPoints

    if string.match(ElementType, "Fuel Tank") then
        local ElementName = core.getElementNameById(elements[i])

        -- 4 -- natron
        -- 6 -- xergon
        -- 0.8 -- rocket

        if string.match(ElementType, "Atmospheric Fuel Tank") then
            if MaxHitPoints > AtmoTankXS and MaxHitPoints < AtmoTankXS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 35.03
                TankMaxVolume = 100
            elseif MaxHitPoints > AtmoTankS and MaxHitPoints < AtmoTankS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 182.67
                TankMaxVolume = 400
            elseif MaxHitPoints > AtmoTankM and MaxHitPoints < AtmoTankM*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 988.67
                TankMaxVolume = 1600
            elseif MaxHitPoints > AtmoTankL and MaxHitPoints < AtmoTankL*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 5481.27            
                TankMaxVolume = 12800
            else
                system.print("MISSING --> type: ".. ElementType.." name: "..ElementName.." hp: "..MaxHitPoints)
            end
            table.insert(tanks, {
                    id = elements[i],
                    u = TankWeight,
                    t = ElementType,
                    l = ElementName,
                    m = TankMaxVolume*(1+Atmo_Fuel_Tank_Handling*0.2)
                })
            
        elseif string.match(ElementType, "Space Fuel Tank") then
            if MaxHitPoints > SpaceTankXS and MaxHitPoints < SpaceTankXS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 35.03
                TankMaxVolume = 100
            elseif MaxHitPoints > SpaceTankS and MaxHitPoints < SpaceTankS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 182.67
                TankMaxVolume = 400
            elseif MaxHitPoints > SpaceTankM and MaxHitPoints < SpaceTankM*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 988.67
                TankMaxVolume = 1600
            elseif MaxHitPoints > SpaceTankL and MaxHitPoints < SpaceTankL*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 5481.27  
                TankMaxVolume = 12800
            else
                system.print("MISSING --> type: ".. ElementType.." name: "..ElementName.." hp: "..MaxHitPoints)
            end
            table.insert(tanks, {
                    id = elements[i],
                    u = TankWeight,
                    t = ElementType,
                    l = ElementName,
                    m = TankMaxVolume*(1+Space_Fuel_Tank_Handling*0.2)
                })
            
        elseif string.match(ElementType, "Rocket Fuel Tank") then
            if MaxHitPoints > RocketTankXS and MaxHitPoints < RocketTankXS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 173.42
                TankMaxVolume = 400
            elseif MaxHitPoints > RocketTankS and MaxHitPoints < RocketTankS*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 886.72
                TankMaxVolume = 800
            elseif MaxHitPoints > RocketTankM and MaxHitPoints < RocketTankM*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 4724.43
                TankMaxVolume = 6400
            elseif MaxHitPoints > RocketTankL and MaxHitPoints < RocketTankL*MaxHandlingHP then
                TankWeight = 25741.76   
                TankMaxVolume = 50000
            else
                system.print("MISSING --> type: ".. ElementType.." name: "..ElementName.." hp: "..MaxHitPoints)
            end
            table.insert(tanks, {
                    id = elements[i],
                    u = TankWeight,
                    t = ElementType,
                    l = ElementName,
                    m = TankMaxVolume*(1+Rocket_Fuel_Tank_Handling*0.2)
                })
        end
    end
end

table.sort(tanks, function(a,b) return a.t < b.t end) -- sorting tanks table by type


------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- UPDATE DATA FUNCTION --

function UpdateData()
    if Debug == true then 
        start = system.getTime()
    end

    

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    -- DAMAGED ELEMENTS --
    RepairMode = false


    for key, screen in pairs(screens) do 
        for x in string.gmatch(screen.getScriptOutput(), "([^,]+)") do
            if tonumber(x) == 2 then -- if repair screen active
                RepairMode = true
            end
        end
    end


    if RepairMode == true or FirstRun == true then
        DamagedElements = 'local DamagedElements = {}' -- initializing data as string


        -- system.print("RepairMode: "..tostring(RepairMode).." FirstRun: "..tostring(FirstRun))

        local BrokenCount = 0
        local DamagedCount = 0
        local TotalMaxHitPoints = 0
        local TotalHitPoints = 0
        local elements = core.getElementIdList()
        local j = 0
        idforarrow = 0

        for i = 1, #elements do 

            local MaxHitPoints = core.getElementMaxHitPointsById(elements[i])
            local HitPoints = core.getElementHitPointsById(elements[i])



            TotalMaxHitPoints = TotalMaxHitPoints + MaxHitPoints
            TotalHitPoints = TotalHitPoints + HitPoints


            if tonumber(HitPoints) < tonumber(MaxHitPoints) then
                --  if HitPoints < MaxHitPoints then
                if HitPoints == 0 then BrokenCount = BrokenCount +1 end
                if HitPoints > 0 then DamagedCount = DamagedCount +1 end
                --  end
                j = j +1
                --if idforarrow == nil then 
                if j == 1 then 
                    if idforarrow ~= elements[i] then     
                        core.deleteSticker(a1)
                        core.deleteSticker(a2)
                        core.deleteSticker(a3)
                        core.deleteSticker(a4)
                        core.deleteSticker(a5)
                        core.deleteSticker(a6)
                        idforarrow = elements[i] 

                    end

                    local pos = core.getElementPositionById(idforarrow)
                    a1 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"up")
                    a2 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"south")
                    a3 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"west")
                    a4 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"east")
                    a5 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"north")
                    a6 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"down")
                    --  ArrowShown = true


                end

                if j < 12 then                    
                    DamagedElements = DamagedElements..[[
                    DamagedElements[#DamagedElements+1]= {
                    l="]]..core.getElementNameById(elements[i])..[[",
                    id= ]].. elements[i] ..[[,
                    m= ]].. MaxHitPoints ..[[,
                    w= ]]..HitPoints..[[}]]
                end



            end
        end

        --   DamagedElements = DamagedElements..[[ 
        --   local BrokenCount= ]].. BrokenCount ..[[
        --   local DamagedCount= ]].. DamagedCount ..[[
        --   ]]

        --  if ArrowShown == false and idforarrow > 0 and FirstRun == false then
        --   local pos = core.getElementPositionById(idforarrow)
        --  a1 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"up")
        --   a2 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"south")
        --   a3 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"west")
        --   a4 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"east")
        --  a5 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"north")
        --   a6 = core.spawnArrowSticker(pos[1],pos[2],pos[3],"down")
        --   ArrowShown = true
        -- end



    else
        -- if ArrowShown == true and RepairMode == false then
        -- core.deleteSticker(a1)
        -- core.deleteSticker(a2)
        --   core.deleteSticker(a3)
        --  core.deleteSticker(a4)
        --  core.deleteSticker(a5)
        --   core.deleteSticker(a6)
        --   ArrowShown = false
        --  end



    end
    FirstRun = false
    --system.print("damaged or broken elements: "..j)
    -- return DamagedElements
    --end










    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    -- DOCKED CONSTRUCTS --

    local DockedList = {}
    local DockedTotalWeight = 0

    for key, construct in pairs(core.getDockedConstructs()) do
        local Mass = core.getDockedConstructMass(construct)
        DockedTotalWeight = DockedTotalWeight + Mass
        table.insert(DockedList, {
                l = "Construct ["..construct.."]",
                w = math.floor(Mass/1000)})
    end

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    -- BOARDED PLAYERS --

    local PlayerList = {}
    local PlayerTotalWeight = 0
    for key, Player in pairs(core.getPlayersOnBoard()) do
        local Mass = core.getBoardedPlayerMass(Player)
        PlayerTotalWeight = PlayerTotalWeight + Mass
        table.insert(PlayerList, {
                l = system.getPlayerName(Player),
                w = math.floor(Mass/1000)})
    end

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    -- setting up variables for screens

    vars = [[
    local version = ]]..version..[[
    local debug = ]]..tostring(Debug)..[[
    local background = "]]..background..[["
    local color1 = {r=]]..color1.r..[[,g=]]..color1.g..[[,b=]]..color1.b..[[}
    local color2 = {r=]]..color2.r..[[,g=]]..color2.g..[[,b=]]..color2.b..[[}

    ]]..GetHubData(Hubs,hubs)..[[

    ]]..GetTankData(tanks)..[[

    ]]..DamagedElements..[[

    local ShipName = "]]..core.getConstructName()..[["
    local TotalMaxHitPoints = ]]..TotalMaxHitPoints..[[
    local TotalHitPoints = ]]..TotalHitPoints..[[
    local BrokenCount= ]].. BrokenCount ..[[
    local DamagedCount= ]].. DamagedCount ..[[
    local ShipMass = ]]..math.floor(core.getConstructMass())..[[
    
    local data = {}
    ]]


    if Debug == true then
        local duration = (system.getTime() - start)*1000
        duration = math.floor((duration) * 100) / 100
        --system.print(duration)
        vars = vars .. [[local Duration = ]]..duration
    end
    
    local json = require("dkjson")
    for id, screen in pairs(screens) do -- updating screens input
       -- system.print(" -- "..key)
       -- OldContent[key] = OldContent[key] or ''
        data = {
            k = FormatTable(DockedList),
            l = #DockedList,
            m = math.floor(DockedTotalWeight),
            n = FormatTable(PlayerList),
            o = #PlayerList,
            p = math.floor(PlayerTotalWeight),
         --   q = FormatTable(DamagedElements),
          --  r = #DamagedElements,
            t = screen.getScriptOutput()
        }
        
        local NewContent = vars
        if NewContent ~= OldContent[id] then
            screen.setRenderScript(vars ..'\n'.. screenContent)
            screen.setScriptInput(json.encode(data))
            if Debug == true then system.print("updating screen "..id) end
            OldContent[id] = NewContent
        end
        
        -- for a in string.gmatch(data.t, '([^,]+)') do
        -- if string.match(data.t,'true') then 
        --    RepairMode = true 
        --  end            
        -- end
    end
    -- OldContent[screen] = json.encode(data)

    
end



-- END UPDATE DATA FUNCTION --
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UpdateData()

screenContent = [[

local json = require("dkjson")
local data = json.decode(getInput())

data.DockedList = data.k 
data.DockedCount = data.l 
data.DockedTotalWeight = data.m 
data.PlayerList = data.n 
data.PlayerCount = data.o 
data.PlayerTotalWeight = data.p 
--data.ScreenIndex = string.sub(data.t, 1, 1)
data.ScreenIndex = data.t



local D=createLayer()
local E=createLayer()
local F=createLayer()
local G=createLayer()
local H=createLayer()

local rx,ry=getResolution() 
local cx,cy=getCursor()

local BiggestFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 30)
local BiggerFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 24) 
local NormalFont = loadFont("RobotoCondensed", 20) 
local SmallerFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 18) 
local SmallestFont = loadFont("RobotoCondensed", 15)

--addLine(D,rx/2,0,rx/2,ry)

ScreenIndex = ScreenIndex or tonumber(data.ScreenIndex) or 1



-------------------------------------------------------------
-- FUNCTIONS --

function DrawFrame(X,Y,Width,Height)
    --  ___                 ___
    -- /   \_______________/   \
    -- |                       |
    -- |                       |
    -- |                       |
    -- |    _______________    |
    -- \___/               \___/
    --
    X = X - Width/2 -- centering
    xo = 20 -- offset x for curve
    yo = 20 -- offset y for curve
    addLine(D, X, Y, X+Width,Y)-- top line
    addLine(D, X, Y+Height, X+Width,Y+Height)-- bottom line
    addLine(D,X,Y , X-xo, Y-yo)-- top left curve
    addLine(D,X-xo, Y-yo , X-Width/4-xo, Y-yo)-- top left line
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo, Y-yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y)-- top left corner curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y, X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y+Height)-- left line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y, X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height)-- right line
    addLine(D,X+Width,Y, X+Width+xo, Y-yo)-- top right curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo, Y-yo , X+Width+xo+Width/4, Y-yo)-- top right line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4, Y-yo , X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y)-- top right corner curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height , X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom right curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo , X+Width+xo+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom right line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo , X+Width+xo+xo-xo-xo, Y+Height+yo-yo)-- top right corner curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y+Height , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom left curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo, Y+Height+yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom left line
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4, Y+Height+yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height+yo-yo)-- bottom left corner curve
end



function reformatInt(i)
    return tostring(i):reverse():gsub("%d%d%d", "%1 "):reverse():gsub("^,", "")
end

function MakeButtonClickable(X,Y,Width,Height,TargetIndex)

    if cx > X and cx < X+Width and cy > Y-5 and cy < Y+Height+10 then        
          --setNextShadow(D, 10, 0.137,0.122,0.125, 0.5)
        --setNextStrokeWidth(D,3)
       -- setNextStrokeColor(D, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
        setNextFillColor(D,0.137,0.122,0.125,1) -- box background
        addBox(D,X-30,Y-15,Width+30,Height+40)
--addBoxRounded(D,X-30,Y-15,Width+30,Height+40,25)
setDefaultStrokeColor(D, Shape_Line, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
local l=40
addLine(D,X-30,Y-15,X-30+l,Y-15)
addLine(D,X-30,Y-15,X-30,Y-15+l)

addLine(D,X+Width,Y-15,X+Width-l,Y-15)
addLine(D,X+Width,Y-15,X+Width,Y-15+l)

addLine(D,X+Width,Y+Height+25,X+Width-l,Y+Height+25)
addLine(D,X+Width,Y+Height+25,X+Width,Y+Height+25-l)

addLine(D,X-30,Y+Height+25,X-30+l,Y+Height+25)
addLine(D,X-30,Y+Height+25-l,X-30,Y+Height+25)


setDefaultStrokeColor(D, Shape_Line, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)


        if getCursorReleased() then

if type(TargetIndex) == "number" then
    if TargetIndex == 0 then 
    else
      ScreenIndex = TargetIndex
            setOutput(ScreenIndex)
    end
end


         
        end
    end 
end

function DrawSmallBox(Index,X,Y,Title,TableList,Count,ShowWeight,Weight,TargetIndex)
    local Width = rx*0.28
    local Height = 110
    setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Right, AlignV_Middle)
    setNextFillColor(D, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1) 

    if Count == false then
        Count = ""
    else
        Count = " (" .. Count .. ")"
    end

    addText(D,SmallerFont,Title..Count,X+Width*0.88,Y+10)
    addLine(D, X+5, Y+28, X+Width*0.91, Y+28)
    addLine(D, X+Width*0.91, Y+28,X+Width*0.91, Y+2 )
    addLine(D, X+5, Y+28, X+5, Y+Height*0.91)    
    local YY = Y+52
    totalweight = 0

    if ShowWeight == 1 then
        setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Left, AlignV_Middle)
        setNextFillColor(D, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1) 
        addText(D,SmallerFont,Weight .. "T",X-5,Y+Height+10)    
    end

    if type(TableList) == "table" then
        if #TableList > 3 then  
            max = 3
        else
            max = #TableList
        end
        for i = 1,max do 
            if tonumber(TableList[i].l) ~= nil then
                la = Labels[TableList[i].l]
            else
                la = TableList[i].l
            end
            addText(D, NormalFont, la .. ": " .. math.floor(TableList[i].w) .. " tons" , X+16, YY)
            YY = YY+25
        end
    end
    if TargetIndex > 0 then
        MakeButtonClickable(X,Y,Width,Height,TargetIndex)
    end

end

function DrawCircleButton(X,Y,Size,Rotation)
    setNextRotationDegrees(D, Rotation)
    setNextFillColor(D, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1) 
    if Rotation == 90 then
        addTriangle(D, X+52, Y+55, X+52-Size, Y+55+Size*2, X+52+Size, Y+55+Size*2)
    else
        addTriangle(D, X+46, Y+55, X+46-Size, Y+55+Size*2, X+46+Size, Y+55+Size*2)
    end
    setNextFillColor(D, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
    addCircle(D, X+50, Y+70, Size*2+4)
    setNextFillColor(D, 0, 0, 0, 1)
    addCircle(D, X+50, Y+70, Size*2)
end

function DrawBackButton(X,Y,Width,Height,TargetIndex)    
    addText(D,BiggestFont, "Back", X+Width*0.7,Y+Height*1.9)
    DrawCircleButton(X,Y,15,-90)
    MakeButtonClickable(X+40,Y+44,Width,Height,TargetIndex)
end

function DrawNextButton(X,Y,Width,Height,TargetIndex)
    addText(D,BiggestFont, "Next", X+18,Y+Height*1.9)
    DrawCircleButton(X+Width*0.59,Y,15,90)
    MakeButtonClickable(X+40,Y+44,Width,Height,TargetIndex)
end

function DrawProgressBar(X,Y,Width,Height,Max,Current,text1,text2,Font)    
    setNextStrokeWidth(D, 1) 
    setNextStrokeColor(D,color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
    setNextFillColor(D, 0,0,0, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2,Y,Width,Height,5)
    setNextFillColor(D, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
    setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Right, AlignV_Middle)
    addText(D, Font, text1, X-Width/2-20,Y+Height/2)
    setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Left, AlignV_Middle)
    addText(D, Font,text2, X+Width/2+20,Y+Height/2)
    setNextFillColor(D, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2+5,Y+5,Current*Width/Max-10,Height-10,5)
end

function DrawVProgressBar(X,Y,Width,Height,Max,Current,text1,text2)    
    setNextStrokeWidth(D, 1) 
    setNextStrokeColor(D,color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
    setNextFillColor(D, 0,0,0, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2,Y,Width,Height,5)
    setNextFillColor(D, color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
    setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Center, AlignV_Middle)
    addText(D, SmallestFont, text1, X,Y+Height+15)
    setNextTextAlign(D, AlignH_Center, AlignV_Middle)
    addText(D, SmallestFont,text2, X,Y+Height+35)
    setNextFillColor(D, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2+5,Y+Height-Current*Height/Max,Width-10,Height-(Height-Current*Height/Max),5)
end

function drawRadialGauge(X,Y,Size,Current,Max,Text,TankType)
    local a1=math.floor(100/Max*Current).."%" -- percent
    local d=math.pi/180
    local W=math.ceil(Current/Max*100)
    local ab=100
    local ac,ad=Size*math.cos(0),Size*math.sin(0)
    local ae,af=Size*math.cos(360/ab*1*d),Size*math.sin(360/ab*1*d)
    for ag=1,ab,1 do
        local ac,ad=X+Size*math.cos((360/ab*(ag-1)+-90)*d),Y+Size*math.sin((360/ab*(ag-1)+-90)*d)
        local ae,af=X+Size*math.cos((360/ab*ag+-90)*d),Y+Size*math.sin((360/ab*ag+-90)*d)
        if ag<W or ag==W then
            setNextFillColor(E,color1.r,color1.g,color1.b,1)
        else 
            setNextFillColor(E,0,0,0,1)
        end
        addTriangle(E,X,Y,ac,ad,ae,af)
    end
    setNextFillColor(F,0.137,0.122,0.125,1)
    addCircle(F,X,Y,Size/1.255)

    if type(TankType) == 'string' then

        if string.match(TankType, "Atmospheric") then
            setNextFillColor(H,71/255,144/255,179/255,1) 
        elseif string.match(TankType, "Space") then
            setNextFillColor(H,1,0.1,0.1,1)

        elseif string.match(TankType, "Rocket") then
            setNextFillColor(H,0.1,1,0.1,1)

        end
        addBox(H,X-Size/4,Y+ry*0.02,Size/2,4) 



    end

    setNextFillColor(H,color2.r, color2.g, color2.b,1)
    setNextTextAlign(H,AlignH_Center,AlignV_Bottom)
    addText(H,SmallerFont,a1,X+(Size/15),Y+ry*0.01) -- centered percent
    setNextTextAlign(H,AlignH_Center,AlignV_Bottom)
    addText(H,SmallestFont,Text,X,Y+Size*1.6)
end

function GetHubData(Hubs,hubs)
    local z = 0
    local data = 'local HubData = {}'
    for i = 1, #Hubs do
        w = math.floor(hubs[i].getItemsMass()/1000)
        data = data..[[            
        HubData[]]..i..[[]= {
        l="]]..Hubs[i].l..[[",
        m= ]]..Hubs[i].m..[[,
        v= ]]..math.floor(hubs[i].getItemsVolume())..[[,
        w= ]]..w..[[}]]
        z = z + w
    end    
    data = data..[[ local HubTotalWeight = ]]..z
    return data
end

function GetTankData(tanks)
    local z = 0   
    local data = 'local FuelData = {}'
    for i = 1, #tanks do
        local ElementMass = core.getElementMassById(tanks[i].id)
        if string.match(tanks[i].t, "Atmospheric") then
            f = 4
        elseif string.match(tanks[i].t, "Space") then
            f = 6
        elseif string.match(tanks[i].t, "Rocket") then
            f = 0.8
        end        
        data = data..[[            
        FuelData[]]..i..[[]= {
        l="]]..tanks[i].l..[[",
        m= ]].. tanks[i].m ..[[,
        v= ]]..math.floor((ElementMass - tanks[i].u)/f*(1+Container_Optimization/10+Fuel_Tank_Optimization/10))..[[,
        t= "]]..tanks[i].t..[[",
        w= ]]..math.floor((ElementMass - tanks[i].u)/1000)..[[}]]
        z = z + ElementMass - tanks[i].u
    end
    data = data..[[local TankTotalWeight = ]]..z
    return data
end
